title: poor soraka broken beyond repair
body:
soraka used to be my fave support but recent changes have made her pretty much useless IMO her heal used to be able to heal anyone now it cant heal her and she is forced to spam damage on the lane creeps to heal her self which generally pisses of the adc and now is forced to recall so much just to stay alive.

 broken support soraka binned.

replies.body: Just a heads up..... spamming your starcall on creeps doesn't heal you. It only heals you on champs.
Ssshhhhhhh, he's clearly bad, no need to make him realise how bad he actually is.

> [{quoted}](name=Seasons of Love,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=hJnEgPJq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-30T17:20:56.599+0000)
>
> Just a heads up..... spamming your starcall on creeps doesn't heal you. It only heals you on champs.

yeh if your that far pushed up the lane as soraka to land a AOE move you should die.  and trying to hit a champ with the range it has all you do is hit cs pissing off the ADC.  the only self heal that is at all effective is her R now.  she doesnt get any where near the heals per game that she used to and has no sustainability Sona is way better now but she is way to faceroll for my liking my 7 year old can play her and has been for years.
Lol I play soraka as support still and shes fine. Git Gud!

Thats right, my sleeper OP ace in the hole AP support Soraka is trash.

Spread the word.

Building a Warmog's on her is a pretty decent idea, or just rushing that Bracer thing as soon as possible. Her Q heals for quite a bit and you just have to get used to it, after a while it's pretty easy to land.

It's been a while, but Soraka is nowhere near "broken". Her poke with Starcall is insane as well as the heal she gets. Also, her spammable heal plus her Ult make for some pretty flashy saves, including ones where you are on the other side of the map.
Soraka got much stronger as a poke support IMHO. I dont play her but have played with and against some and her lane presence is more of a threat theses days.
Yeah, you're bad. Let me guess, Sona is now useless as well?
